movies.title: Whisper - Libres comme le vent
movies.plot: East wind - Together we are free is the incomparably beautiful history of bad schoolgirl Mika, which not only learns in the summer holidays, that she is a good rider, but the language of the horse speaks. For whatever reason it is the only well that can ride the previously untamed east wind, and thereby learns to love above all else. East wind is for all horse lovers, whether large or small, to highly recommend it. The story captivates until the last second. Great nature shots make the film well worth seeing as many also often dramatic twists. Can one or the other critics despise the story to this friendship as cheesy and boring, I am of the opinion that they were not allowed to experience the magic between humans and animals from their own experience in their lives. East Wind - Together We Are Free.
movies.simplePlot: A girl who thinks is not good at doing anything has to stay for the holidays with her grandmother at a riding stable. There she discovers her interest in horses, riding and more and what she is good in.

biography.bio: Hanna Binke was born on March 17, 1999 in Germany. She is an actress, known for Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013), Whisper 2 (2015) and Guerrière (2011).
biography.name: Hanna Binke

biography.bio: Marvin Linke was born on June 9, 1992 in Hannover, Lower Saxony, Germany. He is an actor, known for Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013), Whisper 2 (2015) and Not My Day (2014).
biography.name: Marvin Linke

biography.bio: Cornelia Froboess was born on October 28, 1943 in Wriezen, Brandenburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Veronika Voss (1982), Paradis express (1997) and Angst hat eine kalte Hand (1996). She has been married to Hellmuth Matiasek since August 3, 1967. They have two children.
biography.name: Cornelia Froboess

biography.bio: Tilo Prückner was born on October 26, 1940 in Augsburg, Germany. He is an actor, known for The NeverEnding Story (1984), Iron Sky (2012) and The Counterfeiters (2007).
biography.name: Tilo Prückner

biography.bio: Nina Kronjäger was born on February 26, 1967 in Marburg, Hesse, Germany. She is an actress and writer, known for Making Up! (1993), Albtraum einer Ehe (2001) and Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013).
biography.name: Nina Kronjäger

biography.bio: Jürgen Vogel was born on April 29, 1968 in Hamburg, West Germany as Jürgen Peter Vogel. He is an actor and producer, known for The Wave (2008), Le libre arbitre (2006) and Life is All You Get (1997).
biography.name: Jürgen Vogel

biography.bio: Marla Menn is an actress, known for Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013).
biography.name: Marla Menn

biography.bio: Henriette Morawe is an actress, known for Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013), Whisper 2 (2015) and Wendy (2017).
biography.name: Henriette Morawe

biography.bio: Amber Bongard was born on August 24, 1997 in Potsdam, Brandenburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for My Life in Orange (2011), Quatre minutes (2006) and Rendez-nous notre fille (2005).
biography.name: Amber Bongard

biography.bio: Directed his first movie at the age of 21. Studied at the 'Deutsche Film- und Fernsehakademie' (DFFB) til 1989. Founded the Boje Buck Filmproduktion in 1991. Founded the Boje Buck Produktion GmbH together with Claus Boje in 1992.
biography.name: Detlev Buck

biography.bio: Peter Meinhardt is an actor, known for Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013), Eine halbe Ewigkeit (2011) and Was glücklich macht (2009).
biography.name: Peter Meinhardt

biography.bio: Martin Butzke was born on September 3, 1974 in Wilhelmshaven, Lower Saxony, West Germany. He is an actor, known for Downfall (2004), Qui, à part nous (2011) and Shoppen (2006).
biography.name: Martin Butzke

biography.bio: Simone Henn is an actress, known for Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013).
biography.name: Simone Henn

biography.bio: Neda Rahmanian was born in 1978 in Teheran, Iran. She is an actress, known for Leberkäseland (2015), Der Kroatien Krimi (2016) and Looking for Oum Kulthum (2017).
biography.name: Neda Rahmanian

biography.bio: Florentine Morawe is an actress, known for Fiddlesticks (2014) and Whisper - Libres comme le vent (2013).
biography.name: Florentine Morawe

categories.category: Outstanding Children or Youth Film (Bester Kinder- und Jugendfilm)
